humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, one out of twenty-eight lymph nodes is positive for carcinoma (1/28). This corresponds to N1 stage based on the new rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is N1 because the pathology report indicates that one out of twenty-eight lymph nodes is positive for carcinoma (1/28). The size of the lymph node metastasis is 1.9 cm.
